00014         class FeedController extends EmeController
00015         {
00016                 protected $mimetype = 'text/xml; charset=utf-8';
00017                 protected $type = 'rss';
00018                 
00019                 protected function init()
00020                 {
00021                         $cached_pages = array('software', 'software_comments', 'diario');
00022                         $this->before_filter(array('log_visit', 'block_ip'));
00023                         $this->caches_page($cached_pages);
00024                         $this->after_filter('compress', array('only' => $cached_pages));
00025                 }
00026                 
00031                 public function software()
00032                 {
00033                         $release_factory = new SoftwareRelease();
00034                         $this->releases = $release_factory->find_by_query('SELECT MAX(`software_releases`.`id`) AS `id`, `software_releases`.`software_id`, MAX(`software_releases`.`version`) AS `version`, MAX(`software_releases`.`date`) AS `date` ' .
00035                                 'FROM `softwares` ' .
00036                                 'LEFT JOIN `software_releases` ON `softwares`.`id` = `software_releases`.`software_id` ' .
00037                                 'WHERE `software_releases`.`released` = 1 ' .
00038                                 'GROUP BY `softwares`.`id` ' .
00039                                 'ORDER BY `date` DESC ');
00040                 }
00041 
00046                 public function software_comments()
00047                 {
00048                         $this->software = new Software();
00049                         $this->software->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00050                         $this->software->has_many('software_comments', array('where_clause' => '`approved` = 1'));
00051                         $this->comments = $this->software->software_comments;
00052                 }
00053 
00058                 public function diario()
00059                 {
00060                         $post_factory = new DiarioPost();
00061                         $this->posts = $post_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * ' .
00062                                 'FROM `diario_posts` ' .
00063                                 "WHERE `status` = 'pubblicato' " .
00064                                 'ORDER BY `created_at` DESC ' .
00065                                 'LIMIT 10');
00066                 }
00067 
00072                 public function diario_comments()
00073                 {
00074                         $this->article = new DiarioPost();
00075                         $this->article->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00076                         $this->article->has_many('diario_comments', array('where_clause' => '`approved` = 1'));
00077                         $this->comments = $this->article->diario_comments;
00078                 }
00079 
00084                 public function feeds_list()
00085                 {
00086                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00087                 }
00088 
00093                 public function feed_permalink()
00094                 {
00095                         return sprintf('http://%s%s',
00096                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00097                                 $this->url_to_myself());
00098                 }
